Athmane Ariouet (Arabic; a mụrụ na 24 Septemba 1948) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Algeria, ihe nkiri na telivishọn
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ndị a ma ama na ihe nkiri Algeria, e nyela Ariouet ọtụtụ ugboro n'ọrụ ọ rụrụ ihe karịrị afọ iri ise.
A mụrụ Ariouet n'abalị 24 ọnwa Septemba afọ 1948 na Amdoukal na Barika, na wilaya nke Batna
O bu ụzọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Algiers conservatory site na 1969 ruo 1972.
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, o nwere mmasị ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri. O ji otu olu merie ihe nrite mbụ maka okwu na French
N'oge na-adịghị anya, onye nkuzi French Henri Vangret kwalitere ntụkwasị obi ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ mụrụ ihe nkiri Arabic ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama Mustapha Kasdarli, Taha Laâmiri na Allal Mouhib
Ihe nkiri sinima mbụ ya sitere na ihe nkiri afọ 1963 Le Résultat
N'afọ 1981, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri telivishọn The Executioner Cries nke Abder Isker duziri.
Ihe nkiri ofufe ya nke afọ 1994 bụ Carnaval Fi Dechra, nke a na-ewere dịka ihe na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe nke usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-agagharị agagharị
Mohamed Oukassi duziri ihe nkiri ahụ, bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke na-egosi ndị Algeria na-akwa emo
Otú ọ dị, a machibidoro ya ime ihe nkiri mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gasịrị
N'afọ 2002, ọ laghachiri na ihe nkiri na-eme ihe nkiri El Arch n'okpuru nduzi onye isi ala
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2003, o wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Er-roubla nke ya na ENTV mepụtara.
N'afọ 2004, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ịme ihe nkiri mgbe ihe nkiri Chronique des années pub gasịrị ebe ọ zutere nsogbu ego yana mmachibido iwu maka ihe nkiri
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2017 na nnọkọ nke El Moudjahid kwa ụbọchị, onye bụbu Minista nke Ọdịbendị Azzedine Mihoubi kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ nọ n'oge nhazi" ma mechaa wepụta ya n'afọ 2018.
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2020, e nyere Ariouet ihe nrite nke ọkwa mba n'okpuru nduzi nke Onye isi ala Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
